name: Gift Valley
description:
It's five minutes to Xmas Day, and Santa still has to deliver presents to the people of Gift Valley. Can he deliver them on time, or will Santa himself be on the naughty list next year?

Made by The Creator of DriverMania

3rd Party Assets Audio

"cartoon_wink_magic_sound.wav" by MLaudio is licensed under CC0 1.0

"Jingle Bells" by Kevin MacLeod is licensed user CC BY 3.0

UI

Cherry downloaded from from uiGradients

Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

Lush downloaded from from uiGradients

Game Assets

Customizable skybox made by Key Mouse from the Unity Asset Store

Starter Assets - Third Person Character Controller made by Unity Technologies from the Unity Asset Store
